block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Thanks for 300+ subscribers!! Learn how to fold an Origami Squirrel designed by John Montroll in this video. Less than a minute origami. Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
